text: Tara balala-he soyayeba (ah) apanara namaya ki apanake iha'i siksa deya ye, amara aisaba upasyaderake parityaga karaba amadera bapa-dadara yadera upasana karata? Athaba amadera dhana-sampade icchamata ya kichu kare thaki, ta chere deba? Apani to ekajana khasa mahat byakti o satpathera pathika.
